testcase.name: Unsuccessful Sign In
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to website.............................................passed When user clicks on Sign In button..........................................passed And enter invalid Email and Password........................................passed And clicks on Sign In button................................................passed Then user is not able to Sign In............................................passed

testcase.name: Password activation sent to mail
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to website.............................................passed Given User should be on home page...........................................passed When User open sign in function.............................................passed And Selects the forgot password.............................................passed Then Forgot passsword page opens............................................passed When User enter valid email.................................................passed And Click on reset password button..........................................passed Then Mail for reset password is received....................................passed

testcase.name: Password activation is not received
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to website.............................................passed Given User should be on home page...........................................passed When User open sign in function.............................................passed And Selects the forgot password.............................................passed Then Forgot passsword page opens............................................passed When User enter invalid email...............................................passed And Click on reset password button..........................................passed Then Error message should be displayed for it...............................passed

testcase.name: search the course on home page
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to website.............................................passed When user enter course in search box........................................passed Then user can see the related course........................................passed

testcase.name: search the course by browse course
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to website.............................................passed When user enter course in search box by after clicking browse course........passed Then user can see the available course......................................passed
